definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未記的頭七章總共列出了多少種獻祭？

sentences.english: The money was counted. The sum amounted to a little over twelve thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 29錢被過了數，總共有一萬二千塊美元。

sentences.english: What are all the occupations in our Rotary club and in the community?
sentences.chinese: 你的社內及社區內總共有哪些職業？

sentences.english: Until recently, there were altogether three Nine Dragon Screens in China.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止在中國總共有三個九龍壁。

sentences.english: The network outage lasted more than 2 weeks in total.
sentences.chinese: 網絡故障總共持續了兩週多。

sentences.english: Through microscopic observations researchers identified up to 61 morphospecies.
sentences.chinese: 研究者通過顯微鏡的觀察鑑定了總共61個變種。

sentences.english: M:: No,nothing else. How much altogether?
sentences.chinese: 不，沒有別的了。總共多少錢？

sentences.english: In total, China will build seven of these mega-wind farms.
sentences.chinese: 中國將總共建造7座類似容量的風電場。

sentences.english: That comes to one hundred and eighty dollars. Will this be all?
sentences.chinese: 總共一百八十元。就是這些嗎？

sentences.english: Girl sold a total of about 20 strings, flushed face was brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 女孩總共大約賣了20串，紅撲撲的臉上很燦爛。

sentences.english: This building is about three floors, plus the ground floor, making it four floors.
sentences.chinese: 這棟建築大約三層樓高，加上地下室總共四層。

sentences.english: There are thirteen new words in lesson 141 altogether.
sentences.chinese: 第一百四十一課總共有十三個新單詞。

sentences.english: Altogether, there are 538 electoral votes (including three for the District of Columbia, even though it has no voting representatives in Congress).
Together, the phone and probe weigh about 13 ounces.
sentences.chinese: 智能手機和探頭總共重量約爲13盎司左右。

sentences.english: Collectively, they account for only 30% of all live births with a chromosome abnormality.
sentences.chinese: 他們總共只佔活產嬰兒染色體異常的30%。

sentences.english: Text: A glucose molecule is a six-carbon sugar, consisting of a total of 24 atoms.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖是一個總共由24個原子組成的六碳糖分子。

definition: up to/no less than/as much as
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
